 To apply for admission into the Netcare Education NE Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online

Netcare Education

Netcare Education is a private higher education institution that specializes in healthcare education and training. The institution was established in 1996 and is a subsidiary of Netcare, one of the largest private healthcare providers in South Africa.

Netcare Education offers a range of programs in nursing, emergency medical care, and ancillary healthcare. Some of the programs offered by Netcare Education include:

Nursing programs:

Netcare Education offers a variety of nursing programs, including an Enrolled Nursing Auxiliary (ENA) program, a Bridging course for enrolled nurses to become registered nurses, a Bachelor of Nursing Science program, and postgraduate programs in nursing.

Emergency Medical Care programs:

Netcare Education offers a Bachelor of Emergency Medical Care program, as well as a range of short courses and continuing professional development programs for emergency medical care providers.

Ancillary Healthcare programs:

Netcare Education also offers programs in ancillary healthcare, including a Phlebotomy program, a Healthcare Services Management program, and a Basic Life Support (BLS) program.

Netcare Education has several campuses throughout South Africa, including in Johannesburg, Pretoria, Port Elizabeth, Cape Town, and Durban. The institution is accredited by the Council on Higher Education (CHE) and registered with the Department of Higher Education and Training (DHET).

What to Know About the Netcare Education Application Form Portal

The Netcare Education NE Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission lists, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the NE application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to NE on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

Netcare Education application Requirements

The application requirements for Netcare Education may vary depending on the program you are applying for. However, here are some general application requirements that may apply:

Completed application form: You will need to complete the relevant application form for the program you are interested in.

Academic transcripts: You will need to provide certified copies of your academic transcripts or certificates, depending on the program requirements.

Identity document: You will need to provide a certified copy of your identity document or passport.

Application fee: You may need to pay an application fee when submitting your application.

English proficiency: If English is not your first language, you may need to provide proof of English proficiency, such as a TOEFL or IELTS score.

Health and immunization requirements: You may be required to provide proof of certain health and immunization requirements before starting your program.

Criminal record check: Depending on the program, you may be required to provide a criminal record check or police clearance certificate.

How to Apply | NE Application Form 2024

Eligible candidates can click here to apply.

Follow the steps below

  • Visit Application portal
  • Choose the type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

Netcare Education | How to Apply

You can find the application link for Netcare Education on their official website. Here’s how you can access the application link:
  1. Go to the Netcare Education website at https://www.netcare.co.za/Netcare-Education.
  2. Click on the “Apply Now” button located on the right-hand side of the page.
  3. You will be directed to the Netcare Education online application portal.
  4. If you are a new user, you will need to create an account by providing your email address and creating a password. If you already have an account, you can log in using your email address and password.
  5. Once you have logged in, you can select the program you wish to apply for and complete the online application form.
  6. Make sure to upload all the required documents and pay the application fee (if applicable).
  7. Submit your application online.

If you encounter any difficulties with the online application process, you can contact the admissions office at Netcare Education for assistance.

 

Netcare Education Application Required Documents

To apply to NE you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into Netcare Education, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.
